title: [Large-scale] Achievement Emotion-Based Mathematics Learning Environment Design: CVT-Applied Process

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational math knowledge (linear algebra, calculus, etc.)
context.additional_context: Personalized design to enhance psychological stability and academic achievement for job-seeking students.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce stress by 30% when solving math problems by utilizing three or more emotion-regulation strategies based on CVT theory
Learners can maintain positive relationships with peers/instructors at an 80%+ success rate using social interaction tools (discussion forums, etc.) within the LMS
Learners can rate the "sense of control" and "perceived value" items at 4.0/5.0 or higher in the learning environment perception survey at course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
